verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] trying to turn back the clock a few decades by forcing those companies who operate the electric grids to buy more electricity from coal generation power plants and , thus , less from cleaner power - generating sources like natural gas and solar . Trump administration officials are making plans to order grid operators to buy …
